import React from 'react' import { Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext } from 'react' import { UserLogged } from '../Store/UserContextStore' export default function Layout() { let user = useContext(UserLogged) const errorMessage = useRef() return ( <>
GamesDB
    Home Main Page {user.name?{user.signout()}}> Log out :<> Sign in Register }
{user.error?
{user.error} {close()}}>
:''}
) }
